ISSUE.TITLE: Refactoring of BrowscapXmlHelper
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Should we store values in _crawlerUserAgents and _notCrawlerUserAgents? I don't think so. Otherwise, hackers can send millions of HTTP requests with distinct (not existing) user agent strings. And all of them will be stored into _notCrawlerUserAgents variable. It'll take all memory And we also have to ensure that non-existing user strings are not detected as search engines http://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/t/42200/mac-chrome-cant-login.aspx
